transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Executive: Ha sir, namaskar. Mai Suraj Singh baat kar raha tha Indiamart.com se. Aapka ek mail aaya tha hamare pass Vijayri workshop@gmail.com se na? Kuch address update karne ke liye.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Right. To sir isme abhi jaise hamara Vadodara ka address dikh raha hai, ye Ahmedabad karwana hai address update karna hai na?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Thik hai. Ah, isme ye Ahmedabad wala address aapke GST mein kahi updated hai?

Customer: Indiamart mein ye updated tha sir. Bina puch change ho pehle Ahmedabad nahi kaise change ho gaya?

Executive: Okay, pehle Indiamart se Ahmedabad wala updated tha?

Customer: Hmm, wahi se to hum log business ka hamara lead generate hota tha.

Customer: Sir. Abhi bahut time se nahi ho raha hai to hum logo ko baad mein pata chala ki ye aisa aisa kar diya hai.

Customer: Abhi hamara ek state mein to GST ek hi rahega na saab mere bhagwan aap ye bataiye.

Executive: Sir, GST to ek state mein ek hi rahega. Aapko mai bhagwan bol raha hu ki aap mere bhagwan ho lekin aap aise aisa karoge to kya kya hoga ye aap hi samajh lijiye na Indiamart hi samajh lijiye.

Customer: Sir humko apne aap hi change kar lega to hamare liye to mushkil hoga customer ko kya jawab denge hamara koi izzat matlab hamara reputation ye sab to kharab ho raha hai na.

Executive: Iska phir ek hi solution hai. Kyunki dekhiye Gujarat ka to GST ek hi hoga. Apne CA ko bol ke aapko Ahmedabad wala address jo hai wo GST mein additional place of business mein add karana padega.

Customer: Are wo sir hum log dekhiye uske liye hum log itna nahi hai ki do do crore ka jagah ya office leke waha office mein kam kare.

Customer: Itna to hum log Reliance Industries hai nahi sir. Hum log kya hai ki rent pe karte rehte hai to rent pe phir kitni bar register karte rahe. Already ek registration abhi diya hua hai.

Customer: Abhi wo bol rahe hai ki cheh saat mahina lag jayega update hone mein.

Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat. Kyunki ye jo aap bata rahe ho ye to sir solution se tabhi available hai jab wo GST se ho. Waise to nahi kar payenge protocol ke hisab se.

Customer: Ha to aap protocol chalaiye na aap bhagwan hai na. Chalaiye. Aapko aap jo bhi hai chalaiye jaise aap apne rule pe chaliye. Hum logo ka change kar diya humne bata diya.

Customer: Application se aap baat kar lena. Mai kya jhagda to kar nahi sakta hu.

Executive: Ha nahi bilkul sahi wo to already sahi hai na aapke pet pe laat marega bhagwan aapke pet par laat marega aur kuch nahi hai bolunga.

Customer: Pet pe laat marne wali cheez nahi hai wo company thoda stricter ho gayi hai kyunki bahut sare na is tarah se logo ne na galat kam kiya hai.

Customer: Paisa aa jayega sab straight forward ho jate hai dekhiye saab. Paise ke bal pe to puri duniya India mein yahi chalta hai mai aapko batau na. Ha. Thodi yahi chalta hai ab mujhe ab ye panch location ke liye panch GST to nahi lena chahiye isme mai bhi to galat nahi hu na.

Executive: Ha nahi bilkul sahi cheez hai. Ah, aur aapke Ahmedabad ko khana wana khila ke wo register humne kiya tha jab hum logo ne saab achche shuru kiya tha na apna business tab. Ha. Baroda mein hum log the bhi nahi wo time mein.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Aur abhi aaj ja ke abhi aap bol rahe ho ke Baroda mein bas hum log to dekhiye saab hum log mehnat karke khane wale hai wo aisa to nahi hai ki Indiamart ne hume itna bada kiya ya humne Indiamart ko bada kiya. Aap ek cheez jo bata rahe ho Patel ji ki Ahmedabad mein naam hota tha tabhi lead achchi aati thi to wo to Vadodra mein ho chahe Ahmedabad ho buylead ka to koi link hai hi nahi is cheez se. Wo to buyer ki call ka aur listing ka link hota hai ki bhai Ahmedabad mein naam nahi dikh raha aapka Vadodra mein dikh raha hai par buylead to aap kahi ke bhi use kar sakte ho na.

Customer: Mujhe buylead se koi matlab nahi hai sir mai abhi apna address ke related baat kar raha hu. Ye sab to funda samjha hai mujhe mai samjhunga bhi.

Customer: Par wo hamara address waha dikha raha tha wo abhi change ho raha hai na.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Jiske related baat hai. Buylead ka baat nahi kar raha hu na Indiamart ne mujhe banaya hai na maine Indiamart ko banaya hai. Wo koi baat nahi hai aap straight forward hai company straight forward hai. Aur hum straight hai.

Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat.
summary:
Concerns:

- Address changed from Ahmedabad to Vadodara.

- Wants to update address to Ahmedabad.

- Believes address change impacted buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained GST rules for address change.

- Advised to add Ahmedabad address in GST.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will discuss with application team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- address, gst, buyleads, update
